subject: Microsoft Online Assessment Invitation
body_text:
Hello,

Congratulations! You have been selected to complete an Online Assessment for the Software Engineer Intern position at Microsoft.

Please complete the assessment within 7 days using the link below. The assessment will take approximately 90 minutes and includes coding challenges and problem-solving questions.

Assessment Link: https://assessment.microsoft.com/abc123

Deadline: December 30, 2024

If you have any questions, please reply to this email.

Best,
Microsoft University Recruiting
body_html:
Hello,

Congratulations! You have been selected to complete an Online Assessment for the Software Engineer Intern position at Microsoft.

Deadline: December 30, 2024
